attributes.action: remove our troops from afganistan, tax payers pay for nothing more than protection of  our shores.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
fistly, i know no one fighting in afganistan.
i believe that we should pull our troops out because they are not defending our nation which is what the income tax is for.
we are wasting our taxes and our troops lives fighting for, sorry i cant even finish that sentance, can you??
we are not in charge of anywhere else but here. 
leave it to the Americans to try and rule the world.
please stop British bloodshed.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign one of the existing petitions, for example:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/STWCAfghanistan/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
